title: Jayce nerfs
body:
As it stands Jayce is getting nerfs on the PBE
To  The Skies (Hammer Q) damage lowered to 30/70/110/150/190/230 from 40/80/120/160/200/240
Acceleration Gates (Gun E) mana cost increased to 60 from 50
Transform (Gun to Hammer) bonus AD ratio lowered to 25% from 40%
Thoughts and opinions, and if Meddler happens to stumble upon this thread additional context would be nice

replies.body:
Our thinking:

* His damage is too high and will likely get a bit higher with the Lethality changes in 7.2.
* Some of that's the result of him no longer needing to build mana to be effective. We're looking to both add a bit of cost back in and chip damage back as a result. Possible direction long term would be additional mana costs again.
Would you say {{item:3070}} is something youd like to be core on him

Revert his hammer E mana cost buff.

Or atleast make it scale up a bit like 40 into 60 or something.

Also, how about toning down his free stats (armor/mr) from his melee form at lvls 6 and 11?

Him getting free 15 armor/mr in a lvl 6 fight means he can just tank the combos from most top laners and just kill them, before he had a weakness on his ult at lvl 6 since you needed to put points into it for you to get that (and thus lose damage from not putting the points into Q), 5 armor at lvl 1 is fine, 35 armor at lvl 16 is fine but 15 and 25 at 6/11 are too much, some re-scaling there could fix it.

It would be awesome if you could shift him back towards how he was originally, ie a champion with strong poke. His poking ability is a far cry from what it was before when it was oppressive, his Q-E damage falls off pretty hard late game due to poor scaling. I much preferred the poke + muramana Jayce style.

He's extremely oppressive, do you really think these buffs will do enough?
Loving the reduced AD ratio on his passive (although I think it should be removed and more power/thought placed into his W/E). 10 less base damage and 10 more mana is kinda.. meh, tho/

As the song goes -- it's easy as 1, 2, 3

1 -- Jayce is currently very strong bordeline oppressive especially in the early game

2 -- Lethality items are receiving an early game buff where instead of scaling from 40% up they will now scale starting at 60%

3 -- Jayce loves his Lethality especially how good he is with Ghostblade and Duskblade
